item.description:
It's time again for another Saturday brunch at Rasoi. The last one in April was well attended with 14 hungry people attending.

Rasoi's vegan brunch is also gluten-free and very tasty. The cost is $11.99.

Please try to RSVP at least a week ahead of time (although if you can join us last minute, feel free). We shouldn't have a problem with seating if we get there when it starts at 11:30, but I would like a rough headcount to give the restaurant a "heads up" if we are going to be a large group.

Hope to see everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look at profile pics or ask when you enter. There should be a good sized group.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Brunch at Rasoi
